com.luigisgro.cqf.util
Class BlackScholes

java.lang.Object
  com.luigisgro.cqf.util.BlackScholes

public class BlackScholes
extends java.lang.Object

Utility class that calculates some basic results from Black-Scholes model. Used for validating the results of the FDM.

Author:
Luigi Sgro
